bibl.title: The Meaning of mãlista in 2 Timothy 4:13 and Related Verses. <malista>
bibl.note: Réfutation de: T.C. SKEAT, "Especially the Parchments": A Note on 2 Timothy IV.13, JThS N.S., 30 (1979) pp. 173-177. - Dans les papyrus qu'invoque l'auteur, mãlista signifie "surtout", 'spécialement" (non "à savoir", "c'est-à-dire"). <malista>
POYTHRESS Vern Sheridan, The Meaning of mãlista in 2 Timothy 4:13 and Related Verses. <malista>
